name: The Arcane Equipment
description: Beyond weapons and armor, Thalrathis is home to a wide array of magical equipment—each with its own purpose and power. Potions, enchanted artifacts, and mystical trinkets are scattered across the world, offering adventurers unique enhancements, buffs, and effects. Whether it’s an enchanted cloak that grants invisibility or a mystical staff that amplifies a mage’s spellcasting, the right equipment can change the course of fate.
